title: simple case
data: General info about RUG can be found here: https://www.rug.nl/info/contact

title: complex case 1
data: You can read more about regular expressions on https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Regular_expression#Syntax.

title: complex case
data: You can always try google.com/search?q=python%20re, there is a lot of information out there.

title: edge case
data: A typical URL could have the form http://www.example.com/index.html. Wikipedia has a lot of information about URLs (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/URL).
